titles.title: LNG Now Act of 2019
License Natural Gas Now Act of 2019
LNG Now Act of 2019
A bill to terminate the prohibitions on the exportation and importation of natural gas, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary:
License Natural Gas Now Act of 2019 or the LNG Now Act of 2019
This bill prohibits the federal government from imposing restrictions on the importation and exportation of natural gas.
The bill prohibits the export of natural gas to, or the import of natural gas from, a nation subject to sanctions imposed by the United States.
